Title: The Order
Actors: Jean-Claude Van Damme, Charlton Heston, Sofia Milos, Brian Thompson
Plot: A playboy criminal contacts his dad after stealing a Faberge egg. Later it seems his dad has gone missing in Israel so he heads there. His disappearance is linked to the religious sect: The Order. Lots of fight and chase scenes.
Language: English, Syriac, Assyrian Neo-Aramaic, Arabic, Aramaic, French, Hebrew, Ukrainian
